descriptionlist.description: Add custom widgets right on your homescreen. This includes widgets such as time/date and apple's today widgets.
Widgets can be selected by tapping on a placeholder icon in wiggle mode.
Developers, if you want to create your own custom widgets take a look at documentation link below.

changelog.change: Redesigned to provide custom widget shapes instead of being restricted to rows
Add ability to have unique preferences per widget and display them right along the widget
Add preferences for Clock and Today Widgets
Add Photo Widget for iOS 13, thanks to Tr1fecta
Improve API and provide docs for developers to implement their own custom widgets
